titleStmt.title: Gospel-mysterie or, the great union that is betwixt Christ and the saints. From Cant. 2. 16. With a true way to discern a godly man from a carnal or ungodly man: and the way how the saints return after back-sliding. Also, the worth of a good conscience. By Robert Dornford.
titleStmt.author: Dornford, Robert.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R.W. for Francis Tyton, and are to be sold at the three Daggers in Fleet-street, neer the Inner-Temple-Gate,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
